name: CVE-2020-36385
description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.10. drivers/infiniband/core/ucma.c has a use-after-free because the ctx is reached via the ctx_list in some ucma_migrate_id situations where ucma_close is called, aka CID-f5449e74802c.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:linux:linux_kernel:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h300s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h300s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h500s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h500s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h700s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h700s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h300e_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h300e:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h500e_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h500e:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h700e_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h700e:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h410s_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h410s:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h410c_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h410c:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:starwindsoftware:starwind_san_\\&_nas:v8r12:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:starwindsoftware:starwind_virtual_san:v8:build14338:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
